programme.title: The return of Ross Perot and US social concerns
programme.short_synopsis: Third tri-mester abortions and the resurgence of Ross Perot.
programme.medium_synopsis: The return of Ross Perot as a presidential candidate, the prohibition of third-trimester abortions, the proliferation of guns and the education of children about global warming.
